articles.title: Hundreds of Canadians willing to be infected with coronavirus to speed vaccine research - CTV News
articles.description: Hundreds of Canadians have volunteered to get infected with COVID-19 to test out possible vaccines. Some scientists say the approach could accelerate the search for a vaccine, but others worry that enough isn’t known to warrant these risky studies just yet.
